name: food_offer_promo
description: Bold grilled chicken ad with yellow-orange background and central product image.

samples.product_description: Tender grilled chicken served with fresh vegetables and homemade sauce

fieldPrompt.product_image: Upload a high-quality image of your dish with a transparent background. The food should be professionally photographed with good lighting, showcasing its best features. Ensure the image is well-composed and makes the food look appetizing.
fieldPrompt.product_name: Enter the name of your dish (max 17 characters). Make it appealing and descriptive, e.g., 'Tandoori Chicken', 'Paneer Tikka Masala', 'Butter Naan'.
fieldPrompt.product_description: Write a mouth-watering description (max 50 characters). Highlight key ingredients and what makes it special, e.g., 'Marinated in secret spices and grilled to perfection'.
fieldPrompt.price: Enter the price in INR (e.g., '₹299', '₹499'). Include the currency symbol and any relevant unit (per plate/kg/piece).
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Select a hex color code (e.g., #D32F2F) that matches your restaurant's branding. This color will be used for accents and highlights.
fieldPrompt.contact_text: Enter a short call-to-action (max 20 characters) like 'Order Now', 'Call Us', 'Get 10% Off', or 'Free Delivery'.
fieldPrompt.contact_number: Provide a contact number (max 20 characters) where customers can reach you, including country code if needed, e.g., '+91 98765 43210'.
fieldPrompt.address_line1: Enter the first line of your restaurant's address (max 50 characters), e.g., '123 Food Street, Near Central Park'.
fieldPrompt.address_line2: Enter the second line of your address (max 50 characters), typically including city, state, and PIN code, e.g., 'Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001'.
fieldPrompt.username: Enter your restaurant's name or brand username (max 30 characters) as you'd like it to appear on the promo.
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Upload your restaurant's logo. For best results, use a high-resolution image with a transparent background in PNG format.
